Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: ~harrisob@us.ibm.com , ~wenjian : Have a look? Is this containable for the 1.2 cut, or we defer?

Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: For 1.2, we could add a optional parameter to specify the CA name on the 'setUserFromConfig()' API

Action.author: kchristidis
Action.body: Iterating over the listed CAs a no go?

Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: NodeSDK does not do retry, error recovery, or HA today. I think we should have that concept across all the API's.
